types:type.name: dwid
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type dwid = {| name: String, model: String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, GST: Number {"typeId": "int"}, status: String, discount: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"name\\\":\\\"BMW\\\",\\\"model\\\":\\\"x5\\\",\\\"price\\\":1000000,\\\"GST\\\":180,\\\"status\\\":\\\"available\\\",\\\"discount\\\":50}"}
